jhelp.gui.twoD

Class JHelpComponent2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • jhelp.gui.twoD.JHelpComponent2D
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    JHelpContainer2D, JHelpLabelImage2D

    public abstract class JHelpComponent2D
extends java.lang.Object
    Generic component 2D.
    All components 2D have to extends this class
    Author:
    JHelp

        component2d - Component to add
        Returns:

      • mouseOver

        protected jhelp.util.list.Pair<JHelpComponent2D,JHelpMouseListener> mouseOver(int x,
                                                                  int y)
        Test if mouse is over the component.
        If over it returns the component itself and associated listener else null is return
        Parameters:
        x - Mouse X
        y - Mouse Y
        Returns:
        This component and its mouse listener OR null
